name: BLADE ROOM
description:
BLADE ROOM

This game was create for the Game Dev TV Jam 2022. 
 Project Source Here

It's a die and retry game. You have to survive from dangerous blade disks.

THEME

DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

CONTROLS

[WASD] or [ARROW KEYS] Movement

CREDITS
